Owlhawk:  Sure, Maximal frequency is standard.

OOC: Or at least I think it is.

BIC:  He opens a com to Rodimus.

Owlhawk:  SIR DO YOU HAVE AN ASSIGNMENT FOR US SIR!

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> Katya: Let us report for duty. You shall train on
> the job if we fight 
> now. If he has nothing, I will continue to teach you
> Clan lores. Do 
> you know his frequency?
>

> wrote:
> > Owlhawk:  Oh, then I guess it doesn't matter, but
